title: Chapter 1601 - White Bone Swamp
body:
Chapter 1601 - White Bone Swamp

When he heard the girl grumbling, the corners of the old man’s lips twitched. He didn’t know whether to laugh or cry.

“Bao’er, we and that young man simply crossed paths along the road. It’s to be expected that he’d refuse your invitation,” said the old man. “This is the Luo River Forbidden Zone, one of the most dangerous places in the White Reed Province. It’s perilous and unfathomable. Everyone who enters this place…”

The girl said hurriedly, “Grand Uncle, I get it, I get it! I know not to judge people by their appearances and to stay on guard and all that. Come on, let’s go already!”

The old man glared, but he couldn’t bring himself to chastise her. All he said was, “On the road ahead, you must obey my orders!”

As they conversed, the two of them proceeded into the Midsummer Mountains.

Mists permeated the air. Heaven and earth were overcast.

Countless peaks rose and fell. All were shrouded in mist year-round. Those who entered felt as if it was nighttime; everything was murky and gray.

This was a forbidden ground, so countless perils were...
